channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023120726
item.description:
Report X-2023120726

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: YONKERS
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the unloading process the package begun leaking caused by a loose cap DescribePack: loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in yellow hazmat drum

item.title: Report X-2024010011
item.description:
Report X-2024010011

  • City: BROOKLYN

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

item.title: Report I-2023100013
item.description:
Report I-2023100013

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-05T00:33:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: LA GUARDIA AIRPORT
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Passengers Dell lnspirion Laptop vented and remained hot- This was checked luggage- TSA removed from the suitcase- UA advised passenger and did not allow it to be taken- Laptop was taken by facilities management and disposed of. LGA reported via the discrepancy reporting form.
